events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster as your profile matches a software developer role focused on backend development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the selection process for our engineering team.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, covering your software development experience and technical skills.
Thank you for promptly responding to the screening feedback. Your enthusiasm for the software engineering role is noted positively.
Your technical interview with our senior developers has been scheduled for next Tuesday at 10 AM to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview was completed effectively, and your programming proficiency impressed the panel significantly.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your alignment with our company culture and your career aspirations.
Your HR interview went very well, reflecting positively on your interpersonal skills and motivation to contribute to the engineering team.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive compensation and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer package and expressed strong interest in joining our engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We are excited to welcome you to our development team as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun, including training sessions and system setups needed to integrate you smoothly into the engineering department.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with you officially joining the company as a valued member of the software engineering team.
